system.sustained:
Everyone within range and line of sight, friend or foe, who do not have the Daemonic Trait make a +0 Willpower Test. Those that fail suffer Psy Rating + Corruption Bonus Energy damage ignoring Armour and Toughness, and gain Psy Rating / 2 Corruption and Insanity Points.
If power is Successfully manifested, gain Corruption Points equal to the Psy Rating used to manifest this power after its effects have been resolved.
